name: Buckler
description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

abilities.name: Buckler Aura
abilities.description: Increases the armor of nearby player-controlled allies.
notes: Multiple instances of Buckler Aura do not stack.
Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura.

additionalInfo: With Buckler Aura, the item grants a total of 3 armor to the wielder.
